Package ohos.media.tubecore

Class AVTube

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.tubecore.AVTube
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AVTubeEx

    public class AVTube
extends Object
    Provides tubes for audio and video streams.

    A media tube represents a media stream output, for example, a smartphone speaker or Bluetooth headset.

    Since:
    5
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#MEDIA

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  AVTube.DeviceType
      Enumerates the device types available for AVTube instances.
      static class  AVTube.PlayMode
      Enumerates the playback modes available for AVTube instances.
      static class  AVTube.SetInfo
      Provides information about media tube types.
      static class  AVTube.UsageScene
      Defines the scenes supported by a media tube.

    • Method Detail

      • deviceType

        public AVTube.DeviceType deviceType​()
        Obtains the device type for which this AVTube instance is used.
        Returns:
        Returns AVTube.DeviceType#BLUETOOTH for BluetootH devices; returns AVTube.DeviceType#UNKNOWN for other devices.
        Since:
        5

      • usageScenes

        public int usageScenes​()
        Obtains the scenes supported by this AVTube instance.
        Returns:
        Returns the supported scenes. The value can be any one or a combination of AVTube.DeviceType#REAL_TIME_AUDIO, AVTube.DeviceType#REAL_TIME_VIDEO, and AVTube.DeviceType#USER_EXTENDED.
        Since:
        5

      • tubeName

        public String tubeName​()
        Obtains the name of this AVTube instance.
        Returns:
        Returns the name.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        AVTubeEx.setTubeName(String), AVTubeEx.setTubeName(int)

      • isReady

        public boolean isReady​()
        Checks whether this AVTube instance is currently available.
        Returns:
        Returns true if this AVTube is available; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5

      • isConnecting

        public boolean isConnecting​()
        Checks whether this AVTube instance is in the connecting process.
        Returns:
        Returns true if this AVTube is in the connecting process; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5

      • playMode

        public AVTube.PlayMode playMode​()
        Obtains the playback mode of this AVTube instance.
        Returns:
        Returns the playback mode, which can be AVTube.PlayMode#LOCAL for local playback or AVTube.PlayMode#DISTRIBUTE for remote playback.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        AVTubeEx.setPlayMode(PlayMode)

      • streamType

        public AudioStreamInfo.StreamType streamType​()
        Obtains the type of audio streams using this AVTube instance.
        Returns:
        Returns the audio stream type, which is a value enumerated in AudioStreamInfo.StreamType.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        AVTubeEx.setStreamType(ohos.media.audio.AudioStreamInfo.StreamType)
